modName: New Follower and More populated Cities
summary: This mods give you a new Follower and a more populated cities!
descriptionHtml:
This mods give you a new Follower and a more populated cities!
in the future updates i will add more followers and populate cities!
in this version there are only one follower and he is located in riverwood Sleeping Giants Inn
and The two new Npc are located in whiterun, Market District!
THE follower is called Nivo Avvenicci :D

--UPDATES--
I have not so much time to do update this mod :(
author: VenuHD
